name: Fish Simulator: Agonik Lake (itch)
description:
In this simulation game, play the role of a proud northern pike (Esox lucius) living in a North American lake. Your goal: Surviving and becoming the King of Agonik Lake! 

To achieve this feat, feed yourself; get stronger, taller, faster; and avoid various hazards along the way.

Destination: Agonik Lake

At Agonik Lake, dive into a natural environment of rich biodiversity. Swim freely to explore peaceful bays surrounded by cottages, rivers vibrant with life, zones dotted with recluse islands. Unlock maps to discover new areas, mysterious objects and treasures into the depths. Immerse in a mesmerizing atmosphere with original music and realistic sound effects.

Game Highlights

  • Diverse preys to devour and predators to outsmart. Watch out for eagles and fishermen!
  • A point system based on your catches: the bigger your prey, the more points you collect. But make sure you don’t lose any!
  • Different maps to unlock and spice up your adventure while you keep exploring.
  • Level up and show your fish’s rise to power.
  • Control your fish with a keyboard, a mouse or a gamepad.
  • A friendly, seamless gameplay… much like the motion of a fish!

Welcome to Agonik Lake!
